isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION

svcproc.title: Auxiliary Circulation Fan With PRO SLEEPER
svcproc.para: When the auxiliary circulation fan is switched to high or low position, power flows from the (B2) battery stud through circuits 14AK, 14AV, fuse F10-D, and circuit 14AX to fuse 582-B. From there power flows through circuits 76L and 76K to the fan switch and fan motor. The ground path consists of circuits 76-GK, 11-GAC, 11-GAD, 11-GBD to ground adapter (454).
